definition: PET, positron emission tomography (medical imaging method)
pinyin: zheng4 dian4 zi3 fa1 she4 ti3 ceng2

sentences.english: But positively-charged lightning also occurs, most often in the winter.
sentences.chinese: 但是拥有正电荷的闪电同样存在，大多出现在冬季。

sentences.english: It has a nucleus at the center charged positively.
sentences.chinese: 中心有个带正电的原子核。

sentences.english: So, the bulk of the atom is positive.
It was a very difficult first step to accept the positron.
sentences.chinese: 接受正电子是艰难的第一步。

sentences.english: The samples were also analyzed by slow positron implantation spectroscopy (SPIS).
sentences.chinese: 同时还使用了慢正电子注入谱来分析样品的微结构。

sentences.english: There is nothing saying that that sodium, its positive charge has not been neutralized.
sentences.chinese: 什么也没有，钠的正电荷没有被中和是。

sentences.english: Look at beryllium 2 plus, very tiny, charge plus two.
sentences.chinese: 例如铍二正离子，非常小，带2个单位正电。

sentences.english: And so, there is a little bit of deflection because plus repels plus.
sentences.chinese: 并且有一小部分的偏转，是由于正电荷排斥正电荷。

sentences.english: And so, there is a little bit of deflection because plus repels plus.
sentences.chinese: 并且有一小部分的偏转，是由于正电荷排斥正电荷。

sentences.english: It will be a particle with a positive charge and a positive mass.
sentences.chinese: 它将是一个带着正电荷和正质量的粒子。

sentences.english: Later, electron and positron pairs were actually produced in laboratory experiments.
sentences.chinese: 之后，电子与正电子对也最终在实验室中被制造出来。

sentences.english: Cathode rays are attracted by a positive charge.
sentences.chinese: 阴极射线被正电荷所吸引。

sentences.english: The center of the delta minus is the center of the molecule.
sentences.chinese: 正电荷中心在分子中心。

sentences.english: Experience shows that the positive electrode always burns away more rapidly than the negative.
sentences.chinese: 经验表明，正电极比负电极烧蚀得快得多。

sentences.english: They would be particles of positive charge.
sentences.chinese: 它们也许是带有正电荷的粒子。
